Description: 8 beads in different shapes made of faience. A: Long cylindrical bead made of turquoise faience. B: Six cylindrical segmented beads, two of a slightly larger size, all made of faience, five in different shades of turquoise, on in a reddish-purple colour. C: One ring-bead made of turquoise faience.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
